data.headline: Senior Backend Engineer
data.summary: Experienced backend engineer with a strong track record of building scalable, high-performance systems. Adept at leading cross-functional teams and delivering complex projects on time.

experience.title: Senior Backend Engineer
experience.paragraph: Designed and implemented a scalable microservices architecture for the company's flagship product. Introduced DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code. Mentored junior engineers and contributed to the technical strategy.

experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.paragraph: Developed and maintained complex backend systems for a large enterprise application. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and high availability. Participated in agile planning and code reviews.

experience.title: Junior Backend Engineer
experience.paragraph: Contributed to the development of a cloud-based SaaS platform. Gained experience in building RESTful APIs, implementing caching strategies, and integrating with third-party services.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Maximilian Schneider, a senior backend engineer with a focused, confident expression.
